text: ariyuka: i leaka jivitam verum kaliyum tamasayum purampuccum parasparamulla peannacca prakatanavum sampattilum santanannalilumulla peruma natikkalum matraman. atearu malapealeyan. atuvaliyuntavunna cetikal karsakare santeasabharitarakkunnu. pinne atunannunnu. annaneyat mannaccatayi ninakku kanam. vaikate at turumpayittirunnu. ennal, paraleakattea; kathinamaya siksayunt. allahuvil ninnulla papameacanavum pritiyumunt. aihikajivitam caticcarakkallateannumalla
